item.title: How to Make a Website for Free Using Student Resources
item.description: Requirements Student Email Account Github Student Enterprise Pack Step 1 First things first, you need to be a student (I only know that this works for college students). If you were able to fullfill that requirement then we can move on.
item.content:
Requirements

  • Student Email Account
  • Github Student Enterprise Pack

Step 1

First things first, you need to be a student (I only know that this works for college students). If you were able to fullfill that requirement then we can move on.
